  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.affinity.AffinityKeyMapper
    Use AffinityKeyMapped or CacheKeyConfiguration.setAffinityKeyFieldName(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.DataRegionMetrics
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport
    since 2.0. Please use specialized asynchronous methods.
    org.apache.ignite.MemoryMetrics
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.ClientProcessorMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.ComputeMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.DefragmentationMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.EncryptionMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.IgniteClusterMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.MetricsMxBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.PerformanceStatisticsMBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.QueryMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.ServiceMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.SnapshotMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.TransactionMetricsMxBean
    Check the JmxMetricExporterSpi with "name=\"tx\"" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.WarmUpMXBean
    Use managements API beans, instead.
    org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamTupleExtractor
    Will be removed in 2.0.0.
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SpiQuery
    Use ScanQuery, SqlFieldsQuery, IndexQuery instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query.SqlQuery
    Since 2.8, please use SqlFieldsQuery instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryConfiguration
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.MemoryPolicyConfiguration
    Use DataRegionConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.OdbcConfiguration
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.SqlConnectorConfiguration
    org.apache.ignite.DataRegionMetricsAdapter
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.events.ClusterActivationEvent
    Use ClusterStateChangeEvent instead.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.AttributeNames
    fix it in the ticket https://ggsystems.atlassian.net/browse/GG-29546
  • Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type Description
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupported
    since 2.0. Please use specialized asynchronous methods.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.MXBeanParametersDescriptions
    Use MXBeanParameter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean.MXBeanParametersNames
    Use MXBeanParameter instead.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_LOCK_TIMEOUT
    Default lock timeout configuration property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_LONG_QRY_WARN_TIMEOUT
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCH_SIZE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCH_SIZE instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCHES_PREFETCH_COUNT
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_BATCHES_PREFETCH_COUNT instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THREAD_POOL_SIZE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THREAD_POOL_SIZE instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THROTTLE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_THROTTLE instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.CacheConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_TIMEOUT
    Use IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_REBALANCE_TIMEOUT instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.DataStorageConfiguration.DFLT_METRICS_ENABLED
    Will be removed in upcoming releases.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_ACTIVE_ON_START
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_AUTO_ACTIVATION
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_LATE_AFF_ASSIGNMENT
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_LONG_QRY_WARN_TIMEOUT
    Please use SqlConfiguration.DFLT_LONG_QRY_WARN_TIMEOUT.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.DFLT_SQL_QUERY_HISTORY_SIZE
    Please use SqlConfiguration.DFLT_SQL_QUERY_HISTORY_SIZE.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.DFLT_PESSIMISTIC_TX_LOG_LINGER
    Pessimistic tx log linger property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteDataStreamer.DFLT_MAX_PARALLEL_OPS
    Is not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_BINARY_DONT_WRAP_TREE_STRUCTURES
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_CACHE_KEY_VALIDATION_DISABLED
    Since 2.10 Obsolete because of common use of binary marshaller.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_COMMAND
    Use "--enable-experimental" parameter instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_EVICTION_PERMITS
    Since version 2.10. Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceThreadPoolSize(int) to manage eviction parallelism.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_H2_DEBUG_CONSOLE
    Since 2.8. H2 console is no longer supported.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_H2_DEBUG_CONSOLE_PORT
    Since 2.8. H2 console is no longer supported.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_IPC_SHMEM_SPACE_DEBUG
    This property is ignored and will be deleted in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_JOBS_METRICS_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=compute.jobs" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_LOG_GRID_NAME
    Use IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_LOG_INSTANCE_NAME.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_MIN_BUFFERED_COMMUNICATION_MSG_CNT
    Not used anymore.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_PDS_PARTITION_DESTROY_CHECKPOINT_DELAY
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_PDS_WAL_REBALANCE_THRESHOLD
    use Distributed MetaStorage property historical.rebalance.threshold.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_REBALANCE_STATISTICS_TIME_INTERVAL
    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_REBALANCE_THROTTLE_OVERRIDE
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceThrottle() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_REST_GETALL_AS_ARRAY
    Should be made default in Apache Ignite 3.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_SQL_FORCE_LAZY_RESULT_SET
    Since version 2.8.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_THRESHOLD_WAL_ARCHIVE_SIZE_PERCENTAGE
    Use DataStorageConfiguration.setMinWalArchiveSize(long).
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_UNWRAP_BINARY_FOR_INDEXING_SPI
    Should be removed in Apache Ignite 2.0.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_WAIT_FOR_BACKUPS_ON_SHUTDOWN
    Use ShutdownPolicy instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteSystemProperties.IGNITE_WAL_DEBUG_LOG_ON_RECOVERY
    Not used.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.ATTR_SHMEM_PORT
    This constant is not used and will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.DFLT_SHMEM_PORT
    This constant is not used and will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.communication.tcp.TcpCommunicationSpi.OUT_OF_RESOURCES_TCP_MSG
    This constant is not used and will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp.ipfinder.TcpDiscoveryIpFinderAdapter.ignite
    Since 2.8. May contain an invalid Ignite instance when multiple nodes shares same TcpDiscoveryIpFinder instance.

    Use baseline topology feature instead. Please, be aware this API will be removed in the next releases.
    org.apache.ignite.client.ClientCacheConfiguration.setRebalanceThrottle​(long)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setRebalanceThrottle(long) instead.

    Use IgniteConfiguration.getRebalanceTimeout() instead.

    Use ClientCompute.executeAsync2(String, Object) instead. This method calls ClientCompute.executeAsync2(String, Object) internally, but returns a more limited Future interface.

    use SystemDataRegionConfiguration.setInitialSize(long).

    Use IgniteConfiguration.getIgniteInstanceName() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getLongQueryWarningTimeout()
    Use SqlConfiguration.getLongQueryWarningTimeout() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getMarshaller()
    Since 2.1. Some Ignite features will not work if non-null marshaller is set (IgniteCache.withKeepBinary(), .NET, CPP, ODBC)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getMemoryConfiguration()
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getNodeId()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getOdbcConfiguration()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClientConnectorConfiguration() ()} instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getPersistentStoreConfiguration()
    Part of old API. Use DataStorageConfiguration for configuring persistence instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getPluginConfigurations()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getSqlConnectorConfiguration()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClientConnectorConfiguration() instead.

    Use SqlConfiguration.setSqlQueryHistorySize(int) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.getSqlSchemas()
    Use SqlConfiguration.getSqlSchemas() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isActiveOnStart()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClusterStateOnStart() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isAutoActivationEnabled()
    Use IgniteConfiguration.getClusterStateOnStart() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isLateAffinityAssignment()
    Starting from Ignite 2.1 late affinity assignment is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.isPersistentStoreEnabled()
    Part of legacy configuration API. Doesn't work if new configuration API is used.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setActiveOnStart​(boolean)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClusterStateOnStart(ClusterState) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setAutoActivationEnabled​(boolean)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClusterStateOnStart(ClusterState) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setDefaultQueryTimeout​(long)
    Use SqlConfiguration.setDefaultQueryTimeout(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setDiscoveryStartupDelay​(long)
    Not used any more.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setGridName​(String)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setIgniteInstanceName(String) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setLateAffinityAssignment​(boolean)
    Starting from Ignite 2.1 late affinity assignment is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setLongQueryWarningTimeout​(long)
    Use SqlConfiguration.setLongQueryWarningTimeout(long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setMarshaller​(Marshaller)
    Since 2.1. Some Ignite features will not work if non-null marshaller is set (IgniteCache.withKeepBinary(), .NET, CPP, ODBC)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setMemoryConfiguration​(MemoryConfiguration)
    Use DataStorageConfiguration instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setNodeId​(UUID)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setConsistentId(Serializable) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setOdbcConfiguration​(OdbcConfiguration)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClientConnectorConfiguration(ClientConnectorConfiguration) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setPersistentStoreConfiguration​(PersistentStoreConfiguration)
    Part of old API. Use DataStorageConfiguration for configuring persistence instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setPluginConfigurations​(PluginConfiguration...)
    Since PluginProviders can be set explicitly via IgniteConfiguration.setPluginProviders(PluginProvider[]) it's preferable to store PluginConfiguration as a part of PluginProvider.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setSqlConnectorConfiguration​(SqlConnectorConfiguration)
    Use IgniteConfiguration.setClientConnectorConfiguration(ClientConnectorConfiguration) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration.setSqlQueryHistorySize​(int)
    Use SqlConfiguration.getSqlQueryHistorySize() instead.

    Use SqlConfiguration.setSqlSchemas(String...) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use NearCacheConfiguration.getNearEvictionPolicyFactory() instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Instead PersistentStoreConfiguration.getWalBufferSize() should be used.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.getWalBufferSize()

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.

    Use MetricsMxBean.configureHitRateMetric(String, long) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.setTlbSize​(int)
    Instead PersistentStoreConfiguration.setWalBufferSize(int walBuffSize) should be used.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.PersistentStoreConfiguration.setWalBufferSize​(int)
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.SqlConfiguration.getDefaultQueryTimeout()
    Since 2.9. Please use distributed default query timeout.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.SqlConfiguration.setDefaultQueryTimeout​(long)
    Since 2.9. Please use distributed default query timeout.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.ThinClientConfiguration.sendServerExceptionStackTraceToClient​(boolean)
    Use ThinClientConfiguration.setServerToClientExceptionStackTraceSending(boolean) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getPessimisticTxLogLinger()
    Pessimistic tx log linger property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getPessimisticTxLogSize()
    Pessimistic tx log size property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerLookupClassName()
    Use TransactionConfiguration.getTxManagerFactory() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.isTxSerializableEnabled()
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setPessimisticTxLogLinger​(int)
    Pessimistic tx log linger property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setPessimisticTxLogSize​(int)
    Pessimistic tx log size property has no effect.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerLookupClassName​(String)
    Use TransactionConfiguration.setTxManagerFactory(Factory) instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.TransactionConfiguration.setTxSerializableEnabled​(boolean)
    This method has no effect, TransactionIsolation.SERIALIZABLE isolation is always enabled.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.active()
    Use IgniteCluster.state() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.dataRegionMetrics()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.Ignite.memoryMetrics()
    Check the ReadOnlyMetricRegistry with "name=io.dataregion.{data_region_name}" instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.lockAll​(Collection<? extends K>)
    It is recommended to use Ignite.reentrantLock(String, boolean, boolean, boolean) instead. This method will be removed in future releases.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.rebalance()
    Use baseline topology feature instead. Please, be aware this API will be removed in the next releases.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCache.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.active()
    Use IgniteCluster.state() instead.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCluster.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCompute.future()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteCompute.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteEvents.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteMessaging.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteServices.service​(String)
    Use the proxies like IgniteServices.serviceProxy(String, Class, boolean). References to local services corrupt the service statistics and bring no real performance optimization.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteServices.services​(String)
    Use the proxies like IgniteServices.serviceProxy(String, Class, boolean). References to local services corrupt the service statistics and bring no real performance optimization.
    org.apache.ignite.IgniteServices.withAsync()
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport.future()
    since 2.0. Please use new specialized async method e.g. 
         IgniteFuture f = cache.getAsync();
    instead of old-style async API: 
         IgniteCache asyncCache = cache.withAsync();
     asyncCache.get(key);
     IgniteFuture fut = asyncCache.future();
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport.isAsync()
    since 2.0. Please use new specialized async method e.g. 
         IgniteFuture f = cache.getAsync();
    instead of old-style async API: 
         IgniteCache asyncCache = cache.withAsync();
     asyncCache.get(key);
     IgniteFuture fut = asyncCache.future();
    org.apache.ignite.lang.IgniteAsyncSupport.withAsync()
    since 2.0. Please use new specialized async method e.g. 
         IgniteFuture f = cache.getAsync();
    instead of old-style async API: 
         IgniteCache asyncCache = cache.withAsync();
     asyncCache.get(key);
     IgniteFuture fut = asyncCache.future();
    org.apache.ignite.marshaller.MarshallerContext.registerClassName​(byte, int, String)
    Use MarshallerContext.registerClassName(byte, int, java.lang.String, boolean) instead. This particular method will be deleted in future releases.

    org.apache.ignite.plugin.security.SecuritySubject.sandboxPermissions()
    SecuritySubject must contain only immutable set of information that represents a security principal. Security permissions are part of authorization process and have nothing to do with SecuritySubject. This method will be removed in the future releases.

    Use Service.cancel() instead.

    Use Service.execute() instead.

    Use Service.init() instead.

  • Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.PartitionLossPolicy.READ_ONLY_ALL
    PartitionLossPolicy.READ_ONLY_SAFE is used instead.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.PartitionLossPolicy.READ_WRITE_ALL
    PartitionLossPolicy.READ_WRITE_SAFE is used instead.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration.WALMode.DEFAULT
    This mode is no longer default and left here only for API compatibility. It is equivalent to the FSYNC mode.
